meanings.definition: Not belonging to or associated with a specific department.
meanings.sent1: The nondepartmental team worked on projects from various departments.
meanings.sent2: The nondepartmental staff members collaborated across different areas of the organization.
meanings.sent3: The nondepartmental meeting had employees from all departments, causing confusion.
meanings.sent4: Her nondepartmental approach to problem-solving brought fresh perspectives to the team.
meanings.sent5: The nondepartmental structure allowed for flexibility and innovation in the workplace.

meanings.definition: Not organized or structured within a department.
meanings.sent1: The nondepartmental files were scattered across different areas of the office.
meanings.sent2: The nondepartmental tasks were not clearly assigned to any specific department.
meanings.sent3: The nondepartmental chaos in the office led to misplaced documents and confusion.
meanings.sent4: His nondepartmental style of work blurred the lines between different departments.
meanings.sent5: The nondepartmental approach to project management lacked clear direction and accountability.
